title: Remembering Crystal Hardy-Flowers
description: On New Year's Eve Crystal Hardy-Flowers died of complications from COVID-19. Crystal operated the Sandtown-Winchester based Little Flowers Early Childhood and Development Center for over a decade. We owe it to Crystal's life lived in service to others that we don't lose any more child care providers to this virus.
cleaned_text: Early Childhood Educators Need the COVID Vaccination On New Year's Eve Crystal Hardy-Flowers died of complications from COVID-19.
